effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply nsurance! to their targets that heals them for 942,897 over 15 sec. nsurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 499,581.

(4) Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted nsurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your nsurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: (4) Set: Smite and Penance increase the damage of your next Mind Blast by 25% or absorb amount of your next Power Word: Shield by 15%, up to 3 times.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply nsurance! to their targets that heals them for 942,897 over 15 sec. nsurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 499,581.

(4) Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted nsurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your nsurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,069 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 186 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 9,417 for 15 sec.
